entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 4:26 PM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 4:26 PM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:26 PM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023
